description: Main Dashboard for the Artiphishell CRS

targets.query:
import "math"

first_entry = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: 0) // Start at the earliest possible time
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "component_event") // Replace with your measurement name
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false) // Ensure ascending order by time
  |> first()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: r._time,
    _value: r._time
  }))
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false) // Ensure ascending order by time
  |> first()

last_entry = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: 0) // Start at the earliest possible time
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "component_event") // Replace with your measurement name
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false) // Ensure ascending order by time
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: r._time,
    _value: r._time
  }))
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false) // Ensure ascending order by time
  |> last()

union(tables: [last_entry, first_entry])  
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: r._time,
    _value: uint(v: r._time) // Convert _time to integer (nanoseconds)
  }))
  |> difference(columns: ["_value"]) // Subtract first from last
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: math.abs(x: float(v: r._value))}))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system" and r._field == "n_cpus" and r.host =~ /$server$/)
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "processes" and r._field == "total" and r.host =~ /$server$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: max, column: "_value", createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "processes" and r._field == "total_threads" and r.host =~ /$server$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: max)

from(bucket: "artiphishell")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem" and r._field == "used_percent" and r.host =~ /$server$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "swap" and r._field == "used_percent" and r.host =~ /$server$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})  // Use a wide range to ensure the latest value is captured
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk" and r._field == "used_percent" and r.path == "/")
  |> group(columns: ["host", "path"])  // Group by host and path to ensure granularity
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "host", "path", "_value"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "latest_used"})

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "docker" and r._field == "n_containers_running" and r.host =~ /$server$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: max, column: "_value", createEmpty: false)

import "experimental"
import "strings"
import "dict"

all_component_status = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "component_event")

final_event = all_component_status
  |> keep(columns: ["_time"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> rename(columns: {"_time": "_value"})
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

hostname_dict = all_component_status
  |> keep(columns: ["hostname", "component_name"])
  |> distinct(column: "hostname")
  |> drop(columns: ["_value"])

component_times = all_component_status
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "START" or r._field == "FINISH")
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_time", "hostname", "_value", "component_name"])  
  |> group(columns: ["hostname"])
  |> reduce(fn: (r, accumulator) => ({
    start: if r._field == "START" and (r._time < accumulator.start or accumulator.start == time(v: 0))  then r._time else accumulator.start,
    stop: if r._field == "FINISH" and (r._time > accumulator.stop or accumulator.stop == final_event._value) then r._time else accumulator.stop,
    hostname: r.hostname,
    component_name: r.component_name
    }), identity: {start: time(v: 0), stop: final_event._value, hostname: "", component_name: ""})
  |> group()

component_times
  |> group(columns: ["component_name"])
  |> rename(columns: {"hostname": ""})

import "experimental"

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "component_event" and r.component_name == "AFL++")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "replica_id", "component_id"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with replica_id: int(v: r.replica_id) }))
  |> group(columns: ["component_id"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: max, column: "replica_id", createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["_time"])
  |> sum(column: "replica_id")
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"replica_id": "AFL++"})

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "component_event" and r.component_name != "AFL++" and (r._field == "START" or r._field == "FINISH"))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "component_name", "_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> cumulativeSum()

component_costs = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "component_event" and r._field == "LLM COST")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "component_name", "component_id"])
  |> group(columns: ["component_name", "component_id"]) // Group by component_name for per-component cumulative sum
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: sum)
  |> cumulativeSum() // Calculate cumulative cost per component
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop"])


summed = component_costs
  |> group(columns: ["_time"])
  |> sum()
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with
    component_name: "Total"
  }))


patchery_cost = component_costs
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.component_name == "PatcherY")
  |> group(columns: ["_time"])
  |> sum()
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with
    component_name: "PatcherY Total"
  }))

patcherq_cost = component_costs
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.component_name == "PatcherQ")
  |> group(columns: ["_time"])
  |> sum()
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with
    component_name: "PatcherQ Total"
  }))

grammar_guy_cost = component_costs
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.component_name == "Grammar Guy")
  |> group(columns: ["_time"])
  |> sum()
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with
    component_name: "Grammar Guy Total"
  }))

union(tables: [component_costs,patchery_cost,grammar_guy_cost,patcherq_cost,summed])
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["component_name"], valueColumn: "_value")

import "experimental/array"

vds_count = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "component_event" and r.component_name == "Submitter" and (r._field == "VDS" or r._field == "message"))
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.VDS == 1)
  |> keep(columns: ["message"])
  |> unique(column: "message")
  |> count(column: "message")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ event: "VDS", count: r.message })) // Standardize output structure

patch_count = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "component_event" and r.component_name == "Submitter" and (r._field == "PATCH" or r._field == "message"))
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.PATCH == 1)
  |> keep(columns: ["message"])
  |> unique(column: "message")
  |> count(column: "message")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ event: "PATCH", count: r.message })) // Standardize output structure

default_values = array.from(rows: [
  {event: "VDS", count: 0},
  {event: "PATCH", count: 0}
])

union(tables: [default_values, vds_count, patch_count])
  |> group(columns: ["event"])
  |> sum(column: "count")
  |> rename(columns: {"count": ""})

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system"  and r.host =~ /$server$/)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "load1", "load5", "load15"])
  |> rename(columns: {load1: "short", load5: "medium", load15: "long"})
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "processes" and r.host =~ /$server$/)
  |> group(columns: ["_field", "host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "running", "blocked", "sleeping", "zombies"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem" and r.host =~ /$server$/)
  |> group(columns: ["_field", "host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "host", "total", "used", "cached", "free", "buffered"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "kernel" and r._field == "context_switches" and r.host =~ /$server$/)
  |> group(columns: ["_field", "host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "context switches"})
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "kernel" and r.host =~ /^${server}$/ and r._field == "processes_forked")
  |> group(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "forks"})
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "host", "forks"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu" and r.host =~ /${server}/ and r.cpu == "${cpu}")
  |> group(columns: ["_field", "host", "cpu"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "host", "cpu", "usage_user", "usage_system", "usage_softirq", "usage_steal", "usage_nice", "usage_irq", "usage_iowait", "usage_guest", "usage_guest_nice"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk" and r.host =~ /${server}/ and r.path == "${mountpoint}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "total" or r._field == "used")
  |> group(columns: ["host", "path", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with _value: float(v: r._value)  // Ensure consistent data type
  }))
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "host", "path", "total", "used"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk" and r.host =~ /${server}/ and r.path == "${mountpoint}" and r._field == "inodes_used")
  |> group(columns: ["host", "path"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "used"})
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "host", "path", "used"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk" and r.host =~ /${server}/ and r.path == "${mountpoint}" and (r._field == "inodes_free" or r._field == "inodes_used"))
  |> group(columns: ["host", "path", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with total: r.inodes_free + r.inodes_used }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "host", "path", "total"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system" and exists r.host)
  |> keep(columns: ["host"])
  |> distinct(column: "host")
list.label: Server
list.name: server

query.query:

  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system" and exists r.host)
  |> keep(columns: ["host"])
  |> distinct(column: "host")

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"

v1.tagValues(
  bucket: "${bucket}",
  tag: "path",
  predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "disk" and r.host =~ /${server}/,
  start: ${__from:date},
  stop: ${__to:date}
)
list.label: Mountpoint
list.name: mountpoint

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "docker_log" and exists r.container_name)
    |> group()
    |> keep(columns: ["container_name"])
    |> unique(column: "container_name")
list.label: container
list.name: container

    |> group()
    |> keep(columns: ["container_name"])

list.definition:
import "math"

from(bucket: "artiphishell")
  |> range(start: 0) // Start at the earliest possible time
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "component_event") // Replace with your measurement name
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false) // Ensure ascending order by time
  |> first()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: r._time,
    _value: int(v: r._time) / 1000000
  }))
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false) // Ensure ascending order by time
  |> first()
list.name: start_time
